resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 Android market donations have been enabled!!!!!
 
 The 30 day demo clock has been reset. This version of won"'"t do anything to enforce the 30 day limit. But by the time it expires, there will probably be a version of Cadpage that does enforce that limit.
 
 New Locations:
 Morgan County, AL
 Monroe County, NY
 Montgomery County, NY
 Klamath County, OR
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Sonoma County, CA
 Frederick County, MD
 Sussex County, NY
 Monroe County, NY
 Nassau County, NY
 Blair County, PA
 Washington County, TN
 Pennington County, SD
 Humble, TX
 
 General Fixes
 Crash if Google account is changed before Cadpage preference menu has been displayed
